QuestData.Title: Grand Theft Necropolis
QuestData.Description:
The necropolis is safe and secure, but we can only maintain a portal to the Seat of the Primus for a short time.
Khaliiq will return with you and work on establishing a permanent portal connection.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the portal to meet Khaliiq in the Seat of the Primus.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Khaliiq in the Seat of the Primus.
QuestData.RewardText: It's like we were never gone.

Objectives.Objective: Travel from the Zerekriss to the Seat of the Primus
Use the death gate to the Seat of the Primus
